function RIR_EP04_14()
    -- .承-4【12月第1週】「拮抗の裏で」
    SaveData.Title = "拮抗の裏で"

    -- //BG：和室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1457.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Daria-san has 70% of the support rate, while I have 30%. As expected, it’s going to be a tough battle.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ December arrived, and with less than a month left until the Princess Election—I was trailing far behind Daria-san in support. ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）、ウラン（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Lira-san, who came to deliver the news, explained the details with a serious expression. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0847.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “The impact of refusing a date with Senior Hermes-chan was bigger than we thought. Since the voting theme is what it is, it can’t be helped.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1458.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Because the theme is about a suitable partner for the Christmas Eve dance, many people understandably see me as inappropriate for having declined a date once.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0420.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “My faction and Erika-san’s should originally combine to make up 40%. For as much as 10% to have flowed over to the Himegami faction... this is a serious matter.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0848.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “This is bad, weeds. We gotta come up with some kind of countermeasure...” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：先輩たち（興奮）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0018")
    MSG([[
    【Seniors】
 “Did you call for us?” ]])

    -- //BU：先輩たち（興奮）、リラ（驚き）、ウラン（笑顔）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01ma")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ca")
    --LAYER_POSITION(60,-150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0421.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “If not, please go home.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0019")
    MSG([[
    【Seniors】
 “S-so harsh! But that’s what makes it good!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1459.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Uran-san, it was me who called you. I’m sorry.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-150,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0849.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Calling for Mask Senpai guys is unusual. What’s up?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1460.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Actually, the seniors apparently prepared something to support my Princess Election campaign.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0077.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】
 “Hehehe! Look, prepare to be shocked...” ]])

    MSG([[ When #3 Senpai snapped his fingers, #1 and #2 Senpai unfolded a large poster. ]])

    MSG([[ On it, in watercolor, were depictions of me, Erika, and Hermes-san embracing affectionately, drawn prominently. ]])

    MSG([[ The painting, with every strand of hair carefully rendered, was so beautifully captivating—even to me, who’s not really into art—that I couldn’t help but be drawn to it. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0422.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “What a beautiful painting... Could it be that you drew this?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#1】
 “#2 and #3 have an edge in art, influenced by their backgrounds!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0850.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Come to think of it, their stage set work for the school festival was outstanding too. But what’s the purpose of this poster?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0070.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#2】
 “We’re going to put it up on the school bulletin board to etch the couple ‘Eriele’—Erika and Hermes—into the minds of the girls’ division!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0423.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Just by putting up a poster to make it known... could that really have an impact?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0078.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】
 “This kind of awareness can’t be underestimated... There’s data showing that when people make a choice, they naturally reach for the option they see most often.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0079.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】
 “That’s why election posters plastered all over town and TV commercials blasted everywhere have that goal in mind.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1461.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “I-I see...” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0851.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Y-you’re not joking, right...? The seniors are seriously speaking, so honestly I don’t know how to react.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0424.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “They are legitimate heirs of the ‘Houou Group.’ It’s actually their usual behavior that’s abnormal.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#1】
 “Branding is my specialty! Leave it to me!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0071.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#2】
 “Besides the poster, we’re also planning to make a support video. Ouga is right now out buying the equipment needed for shooting.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0080.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】
 “Heheh... We gotta pull our weight a bit too...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1462.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “E-everyone... thank you so much.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ As promised, the boys’ division came up with brilliant ideas and put them into action. ]])

    MSG([[ I have to work hard to live up to everyone’s sincerity! ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-150,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0852.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “The Himegami faction’s being cocky and not even doing PR, so all we can do is believe the seniors’ plan will turn things around.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0425.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “The complete lack of movement is a bit eerie. They must be planning something.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1463.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Or maybe they have something certain that guarantees their victory.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That was the most likely possibility. ]])

    MSG([[ Given the current large gap, it’s unnatural for them to do nothing. ]])

    MSG([[ Could the Himegami faction have something that makes it unnecessary to act...? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0081.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】
 “Hey now... If Daria’s so sure of winning, there’s only one reason for it.” ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone present turned their attention to #3 Senpai. ]])

    MSG([[ Senpai spoke in an unusually serious tone, sharing his thoughts. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0082.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】
 “In the Princess Election... it’s understood that the side being challenged—this time, Daria’s side—gets an appealing theme that favors them.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0083.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】
 “If that theme’s Daria’s strength, that ‘battle princess’ thing... then her current confidence makes sense.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0426.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I see... If what you say is true, #3-san, without countermeasures, defeat is inevitable.” ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san spoke with a look of conviction. Before we could ask for details, #3 Senpai explained. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0084.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】
 “The appeal theme is probably ‘martial arts,’ which established Daria’s ‘Battle Princess’ brand... She’s won decisively twice in previous elections using ‘martial arts.’” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1464.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Martial arts, huh...” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I recalled the time I was soundly defeated by Daria-san in sparring. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s my specialty too, but this Princess Election wasn’t going to be an easy win. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：和室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")

    MSG([[ That night, after a strategy meeting including the boys’ division— ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）、リラ（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0427.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Lira-san? What’s wrong?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0428.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Everything, including tidying up the tea set, has been completed smoothly, so your help is no longer needed. I’m about to head home myself.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0853.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Ah, um... I actually have a favor to ask of Uran-senpai... No, that’s not it.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0429.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “A favor from Lira-san, for me?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0854.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Y-yes... Actually...” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0855.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “I want you to teach me how to be more ladylike!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP04_15")
end
